title: 30p Bare Land for Sale - on A3 Highway
location: (A3) Colombo - Putlam Main Road, Dalupotha, Negombo
details:
30 Perch large Bare Land for Sale in Dalupotha, Negambo - just 80 meters from A3 Putlam Colombo Highway (land side).

Just 1 km to the world renouned Negambo Beach filled with luxury resorts/hotels, 10 km to the Colombo International Airport and 30 minutes to Colombo City via expressway. Ideal for residential apartment complex, holiday house, resort, etc. Not many large lands left in the area and this is perfect for a development

Has both pipe and well water, electricity, a 10ft wide private road (can be further widened) and situated in a very peaceful environment. Ok to sell partial blocks (10p, 15p, 20p,etc). Please contact via phone or email for further info, price is negotiable

Tel- +94 77 334 3357, +94 72 526 6335
Email - ramithasoysa@gmail.com
